metadata.title: CVE-2022-20476 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In setEnabledSetting of PackageManager.java, there is a possible way to getthe device into an infinite reboot loop due to resource exhaustion. Thiscould lead to local denial of service with no additional executionprivileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product:AndroidVersions: Android-10 Android-11 Android-12 Android-12LAndroid ID:A-240936919

criterions.comment: android-framework-23 package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
